imdb.title: DRAMAtical Murder
imdb.plot: Nothing on Midorijima has been the same since the powerful Tour Konzern forced the original population into the old residential district and converted the rest of the island into the exclusive resort platinum jail. Despite that, A...

episodes.title: Data_01_Login
episodes.plot: Correct episode 1 title is "Data_01_Login". A country where it is literally separated by technology and culture. Aoba works at a shop that sells retro items. It is introduced how he co-lives and is friends with all these gangs in the old area and why Rythm, a popular advance fighting simulation game, is threatening the peace that these gangs have set, together with a gang that is supposed to be a myth called "Morphine".

episodes.title: Data_02_Crack
episodes.plot: Getting attacked with Rythm, Aoba starts to have this pain in his head. It turns out that Aoba knows he is missing some memories from a accident not to far long ago, does it relate to Ryhme or not? He is looking to know.

episodes.title: Data_03_Presage
episodes.plot: Aoba meets Clear who is set on calling him "Master" which only brings more questions about his experience with Rhyme. Koujaku comes over to stay the night but sees that Aoba has two intruders in his bedroom, Clear and Noiz. Noiz and Koujaku come to blows. The next day, Noiz visits Aoba at work and kisses him.

episodes.title: Data_04_Disappearance
episodes.plot: Reassured that Grams is okay Aoba's relaxation is cut short when he gets a call from Koujaku that Mizuki missing. They come to find Mizuki's tag is covered by another along with blood. Noiz appears and starts another fight with Koujaku.

episodes.title: Data_05_Error
episodes.plot: Aoba is attacked at home after he discovers Grams is missing. His hidden side reveals itself for a moment. The leader of the attack offers Aoba a deal in order to find Grams. Koujaku, Clear, and Noiz meet up all worried when none could reach Aoba. They end up heading into the Northern district. A lot is suddenly revealed.

episodes.title: Data_06_Revelation
episodes.plot: Aoba and the others save Grams and Mizuki but the revelation of what's really going on has barely been revealed. Grams finally comes clean about what Toue has been planning and how she played an unwitting part. She also reveals to Aoba about his affliction. Soon he is alerted that the police are after him, so he flees. He destination? Platinum Jail

episodes.title: Data_07_Distance
episodes.plot: Aoba and Koujaku make it to Platinum Jail. While there they are almost taken in by a test, also know as "light drug", Toue sends out. Koujaku spots someone and takes off after him. Aoba tries to follow but ends up in a night club where he falls unconscious. Aoba wakes up on the tattoo table of Ryuho who Koujaku is familiar with. A fight ensues causing Koujaku to become over taken by his tattoos, which renders him dangerous. The only way to bring him back to normal, Aoba must use his uniques power, Scrap. But what will be the end result?

episodes.title: Data_08_Reply
episodes.plot: Aoba was successful in freeing Koujaku's mind from his torturous past. That's night, Aoba encounters Noiz and they spend the day together. They are surrounded by Morphine minions and Noiz fights back getting badly injured. Noiz then reveals his lost of memory and the ability to feel pain. When Noiz is overtaken, Aoba goes into his mind to destroy his sad past.

episodes.title: Data_09_Echt
episodes.plot: Clear comes to help as more of Toue's men attack Aoba and Noiz, but Clear is injured himself. Clear finally allows his mask to be removed. Clear's true beginning is revealed as well as his dedication to Aoba.

episodes.title: Data_10_Faith
episodes.plot: Aoba takes a badly injured Clear back to the inn. This incident has made Aoba realize that Toue has his eyes on him, and it has everyone he cares about in danger. While in thought of how to avoid this, Mink arrives suggesting a plan. Aoba goes with Mink to the Oval Tower. But are they just falling into a trap set by Toue?

episodes.title: Data_11_Fixer
episodes.plot: After overcoming the first obstacle, Aoba and Mink head further into Oval Tower. Aoba realizes Mink's tru intention for coming but before he can stop him the two are separated. Suddenly, Sei appears in front of Aoba. He tells Aoba he's been waiting to meet him. But who is he and what does he want?

episodes.title: Data_12_Dawn
episodes.plot: Mink goes after Toue. Aoba checks on Ren but he is bitten in return causing Ren's memories to flow into him. Feeling Ren's inside him, Aoba decides to use Scrap on himself only to find a battered Ren. Ren reveals his true mission as Aoba's allmate. The final battle between Aoba and Toue begins.
